description:
Kotomi forces the issue of her feelings for Junta, and Junta`s Mega-Playboy persona takes over and tells her what his feelings are for her. Meanwhile, Ami tries to figure out her own emotions concerning Junta, while Karin wonders why the Mega-Playboy held himself back from taking an all-too-willing girl.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tu es toujours à mes côtés.
Zutto Anata ga Soba ni Ita
ずっとあなたがそばにいた
